intro: I am a dedicated and hardworking person with a strong sense of responsibility and duty. I enjoy working in team to learn new things, to achieve goals and obtain excellent results. My passion is creating secure, efficient, and dependable applications for businesses and individuals. Thanks to my cybersecurity education, I recognize the significance of developing and deploying secure architectures applying cybersecurity best practises, I am able to identify and address vulnerabilities in software applications, ensuring the highest security standards.

awards.title: Digitaliziamo il carnevale di Larino
awards.description: Winner of the "Digitalizziamo il Carnevale di Larino" competition held by Università degli Studi del Molise with the aim of enhancing the Carnival of Larino.

awards.title: CyberChallenge.IT 2020
awards.description: Participant of the CyberChallenge.IT 2020 project rganized by the Cybersecurity National Lab, with the support and help of cybersecurity experts from Italian universities and professionals from the business world.

awards.title: Vivaio scuole - EXPO 2016
awards.description: Winning the "Vivaio scuole" competition for EXPO 2016 by designing and implementing a video game with the aim of enhancing the traditions of the Molise region.

experiences.title: Machine Learning engineer

Development of predictive algorithms for a diagnostic support system based on postual and gait data.
Development of a predictive algorithm for estimating the blood pressure using PPG signal and Android Wear.
